test.name: login_test
verify registered user is trying to login by entering valid email and invalid password

verify registered user is trying to log in by keeping Password text field empty
verify registered user is trying to log in by keeping email and password text field empty
verify user is trying log in using email with wrong format and password

verify that user can bookmark the lesson

To verify when user searches irrelevant terms then showing message No result for (searched term)
To verify when tap on Notification tab, it opens Notification page
To verify user is able to logout by clicking on logout button
